title: RailTime
description:
Improved train details along with live train location and live station.
[NOTE: This app requires location permission. Location data will be used to crowd source the location of the train. With this information live train location will be provided.]
Features supported by this app are as below
* Trains between stations
* Live train ( Where is my train?)
* Live station
* Passing by trains
* Train fares
* Train platform information
* Coach positions
* Train seat layouts
description_html:
Improved train details along with live train location and live station.

[NOTE: This app requires location permission. Location data will be used to crowd source the location of the train. With this information live train location will be provided.]

Features supported by this app are as below
* Trains between stations
* Live train ( Where is my train?)
* Live station
* Passing by trains
* Train fares
* Train platform information
* Coach positions
* Train seat layouts
